Hymn.Arabic: الشكر وعظم البهاء هو عمله , وعدله دائم إلى أبد الأبد ,
Hymn.English: 3 His work is honorable and glorious, And His righteousness endures forever.

Hymn.Arabic: ذَكَر جميع عجائبه , رحيم هو الرب ورؤوف . الليلويا
Hymn.English: 4 He has made His wonderful works to be remembered; The Lord is gracious and full of compassion.
